charges.charge_description: 18:2113A.F  BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT: 105 MONTHS. This term consists of terms of TWENTY-ONE (21) MONTHS as to Count One and a consecutive term of EIGHTY-FOUR (84) MONTHS as to Count Two. SUPERVISED RELEASE: FIVE (5) YEARS. This term consist of a THREE (3) YEAR term as to Count One; and, a FIVE (5) YEAR term as to Count Two; all such terms shall run concurrently. Special Assessment: $200.00 ($100.00 as to each count). Restitution: $5,832.00. Fine is Waived. AMENDED JUDGMENT (1/15/15): Amended To Correct USM Number, all other terms and conditions of the original judgment to remain in effect.

IMPRISONMENT: 105 MONTHS. This term consists of terms of TWENTY-ONE (21) MONTHS as to Count One and a consecutive term of EIGHTY-FOUR (84) MONTHS as to Count Two. SUPERVISED RELEASE: FIVE (5) YEARS. This term consist of a THREE (3) YEAR term as to Count One; and, a FIVE (5) YEAR term as to Count Two; all such terms shall run concurrently. Special Assessment: $200.00 ($100.00 as to each count). Restitution: $5,832.00. Fine is Waived. AMENDED JUDGMENT (1/15/15): Amended To Correct USM Number, all other terms and conditions of the original judgment to remain in effect.
